xmlText.p: First Period_1, Montreal, Shaw 3 (Froese), 6:10. 2, Montreal, Morrow 4 (Mete, Scherbak), 8:17 (pp). 3, Montreal, Schlemko 1 (Gallagher, Galchenyuk), 10:13. Penalties_Bieksa, ANA, (hooking), 6:32; Getzlaf, ANA, (hooking), 14:41; Schlemko, MTL, (interference), 19:55.

Second Period_4, Montreal, Petry 6 (Galchenyuk, Pacioretty), 3:45 (pp). 5, Anaheim, Perry 9 (Fowler, Rakell), 8:32 (pp). 6, Anaheim, Rakell 19 (Fowler, Ritchie), 12:15. Third Period_7, Montreal, Petry 7 (Gallagher, Morrow), 15:46 (pp). Penalties_Vermette, ANA, (interference), 4:04; Lindholm, ANA, (hooking), 15:29; Getzlaf, ANA, (tripping), 19:16; Perry, ANA, Misconduct (misconduct), 19:16.
Goalies_Anaheim, Berra 1-1-0 (22 shots-20 saves), Miller 6-3-5 (7-4). Montreal, Niemi 2-5-1 (45-43).
